WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I'm using the wizard for the first time. In the "connect to sharepoint site" page, I entered a valid WSDL url.
When I hit "Test connection" an error message is displayed: "Failed to connect to the sharepoint site.".
 
This message is not really helpfull. Is this a DNS error? A network timeout? Is the TCP port closed? Is this a wrong url? Authentication failure? Printing the exception message might be okay.
 
Bye.
WorkItem.Summary: Error message not accurate in the wizard
